name: Consumer
description: A natural person who is a California resident whose personal information is collected or processed by a business.

name: Business
description: An entity that collects personal information from California residents and determines the purposes and means of processing.

name: Service Provider
description: An entity that processes personal information on behalf of a business under a contract that restricts its use.

name: Contractor
description: A person to whom a business makes available a consumer's personal information for a business purpose.

name: Third Party
description: Any natural or legal person, public authority, agency or body other than the data subject, controller, processor and persons who under the direct authority of the controller or processor are authorized to process data.

name: California Privacy Protection Agency
description: State agency responsible for enforcing CPRA and establishing and publishing regulations.

name: California Attorney General
description: Responsible for enforcing CPRA and protecting consumer privacy rights.
